entry.data:
SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
WEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

CLOUDY WITH A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN SHOWERS IN THE EVENING, THEN PARTLY CLOUDY AFTER MIDNIGHT
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
PATCHY FROST AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

PATCHY FROST IN THE MORNING
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS AROUND 70
